Package database

Class DatabaseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseListener
  • public class DatabaseListener
extends java.lang.Object
    The DatabaseListener-class is used to keep track when certain values of interest changes in the database

        public DatabaseListener()

    • Method Detail

      • getActivePlayer

        public static void getActivePlayer​(int gameID)
        This method checks which player is the active player once every second. It will alert players when there is a turn change or if a player lands on another player's property.
        Parameters:
        gameID - The gameID identifies the game of interest in the database

      • getOpponents

        public static void getOpponents​(int gameID,
                                Player player)
        This method will check for new joining players every second, and update them into the game. It will alert when a player joins, and stop when the game has started.
        Parameters:
        gameID - The gameID identifies the game of interest in the database
        player - The player is the local player on the current system

      • getChat

        public static void getChat​(int gameID)
        This method checks for new chat messages every second and updates them to the UI.
        Parameters:
        gameID - The gameID identifies the game of interest in the database
